description: You can use any root vegetables you have on hand for this warming lentil tagine.
keywords: Tagine,Seafood free,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Tomato,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Harissa Lentil & Root Vegetable Tagine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cups vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube
0.5 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped, stalks included

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large casserole dish on medium high heat and cook the root vegetables for 10 minutes to soften. Stir in the harissa, coriander stalks and lentils and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the chopped tomatoes, stock and lemon juice plus a pinch of zest. Bring to a simmer and cook for 25-30 minutes, until the lentils are tender.
Serve with chopped coriander on top and rice or couscous, if desired.
